description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: SQL injection vulnerability in SeaCMS version 12.9, allows remote unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code and obtain sensitive information via the id parameter in class.php.

Vulnerabilidad de inyección SQL en SeaCMS versión 12.9, permite a atacantes remotos no autenticados ejecutar código arbitrario y obtener información confidencial a través del parámetro id en class.php.
